com.secarta.httpsec.net
Class HttpsecURLConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.secarta.httpsec.Peer
      com.secarta.httpsec.Client
          com.secarta.httpsec.net.HttpsecURLConnectionFactory

public class HttpsecURLConnectionFactory
extends Client

Factory for wrapping java.net.HttpURLConnection instances in HttpsecURLConnections. Keeps default values for most of the properties of the HttpsecURLConnections it wraps.

Constructor Summary
HttpsecURLConnectionFactory()
          Creates a new HttpsecURLConnectionFactory.

          Creates a new HttpsecURLConnectionFactory.

Constructor Detail

HttpsecURLConnectionFactory

public HttpsecURLConnectionFactory()
Creates a new HttpsecURLConnectionFactory. The default settings are:
cipher request bodyno
accept ciphered responseyes
create request digestyes
check response digestno
preemptivateno
buffer size ( bytes )16384

HttpsecURLConnectionFactory

public HttpsecURLConnectionFactory(java.lang.String localID,
                                   java.net.URI certificate,
                                   java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
Creates a new HttpsecURLConnectionFactory. All connections wrapped will have their local-id set to localID, and will advertise a certificate at certificateURL. They will decrypt with privateKey.

HttpsecURLConnectionFactory

public HttpsecURLConnectionFactory(java.lang.String localID,
                                   java.security.cert.Certificate certificate,
                                   java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
Creates a HttpsecURLConnectionFactory with a default local-id, a private key for decryption. certificate will be encoded in a "data" url.
